snippet: Bucks readers weigh on on the merits of Suze Orman's Approved card and other prepaid debit cards.
abstract: Bucks readers weigh on on the merits of Suze Orman's Approved card and other prepaid debit cards.
lead_paragraph: In my Your Money column Monday, I write about Suze Orman's Approved card, a prepaid debit card that is essentially a checking account without the checks (or any bank branches).

headline.main: The Approved Card: Uses for Suze Orman's Plastic
